title: Genomic and transcriptomic data production for helminths
abstract: A multi-step protocol for preparation of draft genomes, specifically applicable to Nematoda. This includes initial library preparation, genome and transcriptome assembly, assembly QC/contamination screening and gene prediction. Both 454 and Illumina sequencing platforms are included.
